content_html: Prime Minister Sushila Karki has held discussions with senior eye specialist Dr. Sanduk Ruit. The Prime Minister visited the Tilganga Eye Institute on Tuesday to meet with Dr. Ruit. The main topic of their conversation was a request from Prime Minister Karki for Dr. Ruit to join her government.
content_text: Prime Minister Sushila Karki has held discussions with senior eye specialist Dr. Sanduk Ruit. The Prime Minister visited the Tilganga Eye Institute on Tuesday to meet with Dr. Ruit. The main topic of their conversation was a request from Prime Minister Karki for Dr. Ruit to join her government.

title: Prime Minister Karki Meets Dr. Ruit in Tilganga
